message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $95?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $105.
